metadata.description: Son Heung-Min, Tottenham Hotspur's attacker, soccered 23 goals in the Premier League 2021-2022 Season, which made him become the "Golden Boot Winner". NFTSTAR records his achievement as SON HEUNG-MIN GOLDEN SHINY BOOT NFT for holders to FREE MINT. With ONLY 777 LIMITED MINTS, this collection is stored as ERC-721A tokens on the Ethereum blockchain. Holders also have a chance to win MAYC, Adidas NFT & Sonny's original signed jersey!
metadata.name: Golden Shiny Boot - Son Heung-Min #1
